message: I'm excited to offer you this great product for a competitive price. I think you'll really like it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. How about $135?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $125?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go below $140. How about we meet somewhere in the middle at $137.50?
I'm getting close to accepting, but I'm still trying to squeeze out a bit more savings. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $135, but I'm willing to make a slight concession to $136. Can we meet at this price?
I appreciate the concession, but I'm still trying to get as close to my target price as possible. Would you be willing to consider a price of $132?
